name: BEACH BINGO - Live Beach Bingo & Slots!
name_original: BEACH BINGO - Live Beach Bingo & Slots!
description:
Play the only LIVE VIDEO BINGO game for FREE, where you can feel like you’re at the beach, anytime, anywhere!

Throw up your beach balls! Beach Bingo brings you the experience of playing BINGO with your FRIENDS on the go! Download Beach Bingo today!

BOOM BEACH BINGO FEATURES:

• LIVE VIDEO BINGO with REAL LIVE CALLERS who are BEACH READY!
• Party Hour games with huge payouts!
• A selection of FUN Mini Games!
• Chat with other players & make friends from around the world!
• Connect with Facebook to play on different devices!

BINGO TO THE TOP
- BINGO your way to MASSIVE WINS while collecting achievements and becoming #1 on the LEADERBOARDS.

BOOM BINGO COMMUNITY
- Chat and play against players from around the world and send gifts to your friends!

PLAY MINI GAMES AS YOU BINGO!
- DOUBLE your chances to win COLOSSAL JACKPOTS from a selection of ENTERTAINING MINI GAMES like Scratch Cards, Pull Tabs, Slots, Money Wheel, Rapid Bingo and Dice while you play Beach Bingo!

PARTY HOUR
- Play the Beach Bingo Party Hour with your friends to win HUGE JACKPOTS!

CROSS-PLATFORM PLAY
- Connect on any platform with your account, so you can play anytime, anywhere!

LIKE US: www.facebook.com/boomgamingcommunity
FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/boomgamingnews
WATCH US: www.youtube.com/user/boomgamingvideos

DON’T MISS OUT
- Don’t miss some of our other FUN and EXCITING BINGO games, from Character Bingo, Bingo Keno, Beach Bingo and more - get them NOW!

The games on this platform are intended for an adult audience and are for entertainment purposes only. The games do not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social casino gambling does not imply future success at real money gambling.
